column1: # Pages leading to Contact & Help Centre
# Segments: IRCC - EN & FR, Public Traffic
# The pages with the highest % of visits clicking on the Contact Us link in the footer are the Passport Help Centre and the Client Support Centre services page.
# (Note that the Contact Us link from the Passport Help Centre is contextualized and sends users to the Contact the Passport Program page.)
# Pages with less than 1K visits in a month are excluded.

column2: % of visits that click on Contact Us link in footer (min 1K visits)

column1: # The pages with the highest % of visits clicking on the Help Centre link in the footer are the Contact IRCC pages. The content on the Contact IRCC pages is possibly not what users are hoping for (they're likely hoping for a phone number to call), leading them to look for help elsewhere, such as the "Help Centre", which has a promising name, but this ultimately causes them to end up in a loop.
# Help Centre link in footer is contextualized.
# Pages with less than 1K visits in a month are excluded.
# Help Centre content is excluded (filtered out URLs with "helpcentre" and "centre-aide").

column2: % of visits that click on Help Centre link in footer (min 1K visits)

column1: # 2 of the top 5 news releases, as well as the top 2 web notices, were related to international students.
Canada to introduce new rules around off-campus work hours for international students
Canada to stabilize growth and decrease number of new international student permits issued to approximately 360,000 for 2024
Changes to the Start-up Visa and Self-Employed Persons programs to help reduce backlogs and improve processing times
Canada expands simplified renewal process for passports
Canada announces new immigration pilots to support rural and Francophone minority communities, will create a permanent program
Permanent residence fees increasing on April 30, 2024
Additional information about International Student Program reforms
Visitors can continue to apply for work permits inside Canada with temporary policy extended by 2 years
Update on public-private college partnership programs for international students
CUAET measures extended for those affected by processing delays
